channel.title: Gas meter on Martin's Blog 3
channel.description: Recent content in Gas meter on Martin's Blog 3

item.title: Swalec and a gas meter reading error
item.description: This will be my public consumer awareness post. Just for those who don’t know me, I have not lived in the UK for many years so I had no real idea how much utilities cost. Sure you can compare prices between different companies but its difficult to know, how much you spend. However I always thought I was paying a bit to much for gas but was delaying the time to actually call up the gas copmany and ask for some help.
